${modID}:GrowthCard.NAME: Growth
${modID}:GrowthCard.DESCRIPTION: This card is played invisibly as part of the ${modID}:Growth mechanic.
${modID}:GrowthCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This card is played invisibly as part of the ${modID}:Growth mechanic.

${modID}:DistantJourney.NAME: Distant Journey
${modID}:DistantJourney.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Draw !${modID}:M2! card{!${modID}:M2!|>1,<1=s}. When you reach an ${modID}:Oasis, increase the cards drawn by !M!. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DistantJourney.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Draw !${modID}:M2! card{!${modID}:M2!|>1,<1=s}. When you reach an ${modID}:Oasis, increase the cards drawn by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WayfindersStrike.NAME: Wayfinder's Strike
${modID}:WayfindersStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Shuffle !M! *Tiny *Oas{!M!|@=es|1=is} into your draw pile.
${modID}:WayfindersStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Shuffle !M! *Tiny *Oas{!M!|@=es|1=is} into your draw pile.

${modID}:EndlessExpanse.NAME: Endless Expanse
${modID}:EndlessExpanse.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The first time each turn you draw a card you can't play, gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}.
${modID}:EndlessExpanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}The first time each turn you draw a card you can't play, gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}.

${modID}:Sunshroud.NAME: Sunshroud
${modID}:Sunshroud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.
${modID}:Sunshroud.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ShiftingSands.NAME: Shifting Sands
${modID}:ShiftingSands.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1,<1=s} instead of *Exhausting.
${modID}:ShiftingSands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1,<1=s} instead of *Exhausting.

${modID}:TheInquisitor.NAME: The Inquisitor
${modID}:TheInquisitor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle an *Oasis *of *Tears into your draw pile. NL When you reach an ${modID}:Oasis, this card deals !M! more damage.
${modID}:TheInquisitor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle an *Oasis *of *Tears into your draw pile. NL When you reach an ${modID}:Oasis, this card deals !M! more damage.

${modID}:OasisOfTears.NAME: Oasis of Tears
${modID}:OasisOfTears.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Oasis !${modID}:M2!. NL This card is Ethereal while its Oasis Progress is at 0.
${modID}:OasisOfTears.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Oasis !${modID}:M2!. NL This card is Ethereal while its Oasis Progress is at 0.

${modID}:Bladework.NAME: Bladework
${modID}:Bladework.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Bloom Deal !${modID}:D2! damage to ALL enemies instead.
${modID}:Bladework.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Bloom Deal !${modID}:D2! damage to ALL enemies instead.

${modID}:Seeker.NAME: Seeker
${modID}:Seeker.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard a card. NL Your next ${modID}:Bloom gains {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}.
${modID}:Seeker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard a card. NL Your next ${modID}:Bloom gains {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}.

${modID}:Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
${modID}:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: {@@} Choose !M! card{!M!|>1,<1=s} in your Exhaust pile. Shuffle {!M!|@=copies|1=a copy} of {!M!|@=them|1=it} and !M! *Wound{!M!|>1,<1=s} into your draw pile.
${modID}:Sacrifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@} Choose !M! card{!M!|>1,<1=s} in your Exhaust pile. Shuffle {!M!|@=Upgraded copies|1=an Upgraded copy} of {!M!|@=them|1=it} and !M! *Wound{!M!|>1,<1=s} into your draw pile.

${modID}:HardyFlora.NAME: Hardy Flora
${modID}:HardyFlora.DESCRIPTION: {@@} Channel !M! *Red ${modID}:Flower{!M!|>1,<1=s}. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Channel !M! *Green *Flower{!M!|>1,<1=s} instead. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WeaknessExploit.NAME: Weakness Exploit
${modID}:WeaknessExploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target gains Block or a buff this turn, it also gains !M! Vulnerable.
${modID}:WeaknessExploit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target gains Block or a buff this turn, it also gains !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:LostRuins.NAME: Lost Ruins
${modID}:LostRuins.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Exhaust up to !M! cards. Gain [E] equal to their combined cost.
${modID}:LostRuins.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Exhaust up to !M! cards. Gain [E] equal to their combined cost.

${modID}:HiddenOasis.NAME: Hidden Oasis
${modID}:HiddenOasis.DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Oasis !${modID}:M2! NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:HiddenOasis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Oasis !${modID}:M2! NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TheScoundrel.NAME: The Scoundrel
${modID}:TheScoundrel.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Channel a ${modID}:Flower of each color.
${modID}:TheScoundrel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Channel a ${modID}:Flower of each color.

${modID}:Sunrise.NAME: Sunrise
${modID}:Sunrise.DESCRIPTION: {@@}For the rest of combat, ${modID}:Bloom: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1,<1=s}.
${modID}:Sunrise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL For the rest of combat, ${modID}:Bloom: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1,<1=s}.

${modID}:TheDesigner.NAME: The Designer
${modID}:TheDesigner.DESCRIPTION: {@@}!M! time{!M!|>1,<1=s} each turn when you ${modID}:Bloom, *Bloom again with a blank card.
${modID}:TheDesigner.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL !M! time{!M!|>1,<1=s} each turn when you ${modID}:Bloom *Bloom: again with a blank card.

${modID}:Sanctuary.NAME: Sanctuary
${modID}:Sanctuary.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Add !M! *Hidden *Oas{!M!|@=es|1=is} to your hand.
${modID}:Sanctuary.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Add !M! Upgraded *Hidden *Oas{!M!|@=es|1=is} to your hand.

${modID}:TheWarden.NAME: The Warden
${modID}:TheWarden.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Dexterity each time you ${modID}:Bloom this turn. NL *Bloom: Gain Temporary Strength instead.
${modID}:TheWarden.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Dexterity each time you ${modID}:Bloom this turn. NL *Bloom: Gain Temporary Strength instead.

${modID}:WildGrowth.NAME: Wild Growth
${modID}:WildGrowth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL ${modID}:Grow X.
${modID}:WildGrowth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL ${modID}:Grow X.

${modID}:TrialoftheJackal.NAME: Trial of the Jackal
${modID}:TrialoftheJackal.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Oasis !${modID}:M2!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Reset this card's *Oasis progress once it's played.
${modID}:TrialoftheJackal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Oasis !${modID}:M2!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Reset this card's *Oasis progress once it's played.

${modID}:PathoftheJackal.NAME: Path of the Jackal
${modID}:PathoftheJackal.DESCRIPTION: Each time you reach an ${modID}:Oasis, gain !M! Vigor.
${modID}:PathoftheJackal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each time you reach an ${modID}:Oasis, gain !M! Vigor.

${modID}:PathoftheCobra.NAME: Path of the Cobra
${modID}:PathoftheCobra.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The first !M! time{!M!|>1,<1=s} you ${modID}:Bloom each turn, channel a ${modID}:Flower of that card's type.
${modID}:PathoftheCobra.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL The first !M! time{!M!|>1,<1=s} you ${modID}:Bloom each turn, channel a ${modID}:Flower of that card's type.

${modID}:RiddleoftheCobra.NAME: Riddle of the Cobra
${modID}:RiddleoftheCobra.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If you have the same or higher energy after using this card, gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}.
${modID}:RiddleoftheCobra.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If you have the same or higher energy after using this card, gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}.

${modID}:GazeoftheFalcon.NAME: Gaze of the Falcon
${modID}:GazeoftheFalcon.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies instead. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:GazeoftheFalcon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Bloom: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies instead. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GripofTheCrocodile.NAME: Grip of the Crocodile
${modID}:GripofTheCrocodile.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage and gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}. NL ${modID}:Bloom: This card is free to play.
${modID}:GripofTheCrocodile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage and gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}. NL ${modID}:Bloom: This card is free to play.

${modID}:AgainsttheOdds.NAME: Against the  Odds
${modID}:AgainsttheOdds.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is neither Weak nor Vulnerable, gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}.
${modID}:AgainsttheOdds.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is neither Weak nor Vulnerable, gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}.

${modID}:PathoftheCrocodile.NAME: Path of the Crocodile
${modID}:PathoftheCrocodile.DESCRIPTION: *Choose: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing an *Attack, *Skill, or *Power for !M! turns.
${modID}:PathoftheCrocodile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Choose: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing an *Attack, *Skill, *Power, Status, or Curse  for !M! turns.

${modID}:CrocPathAttack.NAME: Path of Resolve
${modID}:CrocPathAttack.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing an *Attack for !M! turns.
${modID}:CrocPathAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing an *Attack for !M! turns.

${modID}:CrocPathSkill.NAME: Path of Patience
${modID}:CrocPathSkill.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing a *Skill for !M! turns.
${modID}:CrocPathSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing a *Skill for !M! turns.

${modID}:CrocPathPower.NAME: Path of Dedication
${modID}:CrocPathPower.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing a *Power for !M! turns.
${modID}:CrocPathPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing a *Power for !M! turns.

${modID}:CrocPathStatus.NAME: Path of Focus
${modID}:CrocPathStatus.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing a *Status for !M! turns.
${modID}:CrocPathStatus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing a *Status for !M! turns.

${modID}:CrocPathCurse.NAME: Path of Tenacity
${modID}:CrocPathCurse.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing a *Curse for !M! turns.
${modID}:CrocPathCurse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Growth is now treated as playing a *Curse for !M! turns.

${modID}:PathoftheFalcon.NAME: Path of the Falcon
${modID}:PathoftheFalcon.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${modID}:Bloom, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength that turn.
${modID}:PathoftheFalcon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${modID}:Bloom, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength that turn.

${modID}:DefensiveStrike.NAME: DefensiveStrike
${modID}:DefensiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@} {!M!|@=Deal !D! damage.|%2=Gain !B! Block, based on damage dealt.} NL Transforms in your hand.
${modID}:DefensiveStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@} {!M!|@=Deal !D! damage.|%2=Gain !B! Block, based on damage dealt.} NL Transforms in your hand.
